RUN echo "deb http://http.debian.net/debian squeeze main contrib non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list RUN apt-get update
RUN echo "sun-java6-jdk shared/accepted-sun-dlj-v1-1 boolean true" | debconf-set-selections RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y -q install sun-java6-jre sun-java6-jdk maven2 tomcat6 apache2 ntpdate wget RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y -q purge openjdk* ENV JAVA_HOME "/usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun/" ENV JAVA_OPTS "-Xmx1000m -XX:MaxPermSize=1024m" ENV CATALINA_HOME "/etc/tomcat6/" ENV CAS_HOME "/opt/idp-cas/cas/"
RUN mkdir -p /opt/idp-cas/cas/logs RUN mkdir -p /opt/idp-cas/cas/war RUN mkdir -p /opt/idp-cas/cas/autodeploy RUN mkdir -p /opt/idp-cas/cas/credentials RUN mkdir -p /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads
RUN cd /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads RUN wget http://downloads.jasig.org/cas/cas-server-3.5.2-release.tar.gz -O /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.2-release.tar.gz RUN tar -xvf /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.2-release.tar.gz -C /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads

#RUN echo "<dependencies>" >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.1/cas-server-webapp/pom.xml #RUN echo "<dependency>" >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.1/cas-server-webapp/pom.xml #RUN echo "<groupId>\${project.groupId}</groupId>" >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.1/cas-server-webapp/pom.xml #RUN echo "<artifactId>cas-server-support-ldap</artifactId>" >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.1/cas-server-webapp/pom.xml #RUN echo "<version>\${project.version}</version>" >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.1/cas-server-webapp/pom.xml #RUN echo "<dependency>" >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.1/cas-server-webapp/pom.xml #RUN echo "<dependencies>" >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.1/cas-server-webapp/pom.xml
#RUN mvn package RUN cp /opt/idp-cas/cas/downloads/cas-server-3.5.2/modules/cas-server-webapp-3.5.2.war /opt/idp-cas/cas/war/cas.war
RUN echo '<Context docBase="/opt/idp-cas/cas/war/cas.war" privileged="true" antiResourceLocking="false" antiJARLocking="false" unpackWAR="false"/>' >> /opt/idp-cas/cas/autodeploy/cas.xml RUN cp /opt/idp-cas/cas/autodeploy/cas.xml /etc/tomcat6/Catalina/localhost/cas.xml RUN rm -r /var/lib/tomcat6/webapps/ROOT RUN chown -R tomcat6 /opt/idp-cas/cas/
RUN echo "" >> /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf RUN echo "[program:tomcat]" >> /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf RUN echo "command=/etc/init.d/tomcat6 start" >> /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf
